All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Addressee
Abstract class that represents an addressee, which can be a client or a group chat
Client
Class that represents a client
ClientController
Controller for the client
ClientReceiveThread
Thread in charge of receiving messages for each client
ClientSendThread
Thread used to send messages for the client running this thread
ClientThread
Thread that handles all the requests incoming from a given client.
DAO
This class takes care of interacting with JPAUtil, the class that takes care about persisting the objects
GroupChat
Class that represents a group chat, in which there can be several clients

Message
Class that represents all messages exchanged.

Service
This class provides general services to all classes so they can interact with the database
